name: Beyond Clouds
storyline:
My name is Mishio Eri.
I’m good at studying, fantastic at sport, and my body is perfect.
I basically know everything in this world——
——Except how to love someone.
A boy recently caught my attention, my classmate Hirosaki-kun.
Though he’s a funny guy, but the something happened recently makes me wonder if he’s too funny.
Surprisingly he turned down Satou-chan’s affection.
Yeah, it is the same Satou-chan that is on every guy’s 1st choice on the ‘Girl I wanna marry’ list.
As the cutest girl in the whole school, she’s also incredibly good-mannered, who attracts the attention of both boys and girls.
Why the heck, would he, a virile young man, turn down such a perfect girl?
Maybe he’s taken? Impotent? Gay? I did a little research, it’s none of that.
So WHY? I can feel my hair scratching thinner by myself.
Huh! The smell of secret is almost tempting.

「Come, come! My humble servents! Our Astronomical Observation Club, or should I say, Love Observation Club is now in business! 」
summary: Beyond Clouds is a Galgame about love stories. It reflects everybody’s daily life with a tat of humor, and touches your soul by connecting with your life.
